com.navaile.enigma4k

Class Crypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navaile.enigma4k.Crypt

  • public class Crypt
extends Object
    Crypt based on the Enigma/Fialka/SIGABA, attempts have been made to remove known weaknesses. Rotor/Plugboard Permutations perm = factorial(rotorSize) = 46,655! = 1.478143766589091023060 x 10^197568 = 10^10^5.295716976537452 Known Limitations Rotor/plugboard variations are limited by 64bit seed. = (64bit permutations) / (rotor/pb permutations) = (9.22 x 10^18 * 2) / (1.478 x 10^197568) = only a tiny percent of all possible permutations is possible due to the limitations of current computer architecture random seed size of: 10^197568 = 2^x x = 197568*ln(10)/ln(2) x = 656306.68 2^656306.68 size long seed required for all ro/pb permutations TODO optimize/refactor
    Author:
    navaile

    • Constructor Detail

      • Crypt

        public Crypt(String passPhrase,
             String handle,
             String msgID,
             int roCount,
             int pbCount,
             boolean encrypt)
        Builds Crypto, configures settings.
        Parameters:
        passPhrase - pass phrase, password
        handle - recipient name/email/handle
        msgID - msgID auto generated by genMsgID()
        roCount - rotor count, 97 - 4000
        pbCount - plugboard count, 97 - 500
        encrypt - encryption flag, true if encrypting

        count - value to check
        min - minimum bounds
        max - max bounds
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        rnd - random number generator
        rotorIndex - rotor index
        roSpin - rotor direction spin array, forward: 1, backward: -1
        DIR_SIZE - directory size

                                 int roCount,

        Static encryption.
        Parameters:
        passPhrase - pass phrase or password
        handle - recipient email, handle, or name
        roCount - rotor count
        pbCount - plugboard count
        dirSeed - directory randomization seed, default is null
        plainText - text message to encrypt
        Returns:
        encrypted text

      • randomizeDirectory

        public void randomizeDirectory(Long seed)
        This method will randomize the directory based on the seed supplied. Randomizing the directory increases security however both parties must use the same seed when randomizing the directory to ensure that both parties have the same directory.
        Parameters:
        seed - random directory seed
